plugin.label: pointerCastDistortion
plugin.name: Pointer cast distortion
plugin.p: This distortion is created by treating the floating point representation of the input signal as a 0.32 1's complement fixedpoint integer. Its very unmusical but supprisingly recognisable. I'm not sure that its useful for anything, but it can make interesting noises.

port.label: cutoff
port.name: Effect cutoff freq (Hz)
port.p: Controls the frequencies that will be passed to the effect.

port.label: wet
port.name: Dry/wet mix
port.p: Controls the ammunt of distorting mixed into the output.
